name: LabLoad
description:
Find a way out of the maze and don'tlook back. Game for Loading Screen Jam

Music by: Eric Skiff

[12/12/2015] Update changelog:

1. UI Camera shake fix
2. Removed bottom text
3. New header text
4. Changed loose and win texts and icons
5. Loading time changed from 25 to 15 seconds
6. Random level each time (+2 levels)
7. News tyle of progress circle
